meanings.definition: A person who avoids paying their share of expenses.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a budger and contribute your fair share.
meanings.sent2: He's known as the office budger, always dodging bills.
meanings.sent3: The budger conveniently forgot his wallet again.
meanings.sent4: She slyly slipped away, living up to her reputation as a budger.
meanings.sent5: The group was frustrated with the budger who never pitched in.
